title: DERC scam token
body:
Hello,

DeRace token appears to have been duplicated by scammers  so that the scammed token reflects the price of the real one . This is how I purchased the token and did not realize it was a scam token until I could not exchange it . 

I lost 1.2 Eth . 

1. DeRace Token
https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/derace/
https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/derace

On dex guru and uniswap token contract 0x463d5b1d8ca19a583ce088d8570d3f71baea3512 searching the contract via the web shows that it had been listed as the token for the project . Regardless it is a project bought into and now I am unable to cash the project in and therefore have been scammed . 

2. Affected Wallet: 

0xb5deb8726f6992a2163b054ab8dbe73caba6ec49

3. Happened on Aug 3 2021

4. Telegram ID : @dayzze

5. Transaction ID: 0xb2497007ed14a9653232d4cbbb677114df4e6e19db0970567a843603f1b3c469

This case should be covered by insurance . This was sophisticated scamming circumstance where the token is coded to reflect the exact value of the real project .
author: 0xb5dEb8726F6992A2163B054AB8DbE73caBA6eC49
